_header: Which had that affiance and inspiration
_description: The founding of Worksop Abbey, a chronicle by the monk Pigott — twenty-six stanzas rhyme royal

BLLan205.First Lines:
Which had that affiance and inspirationThe monasterie of worssoppe
                    firste to be founde…
BLLan205.Last Lines:
…In our Ladie Quene let Northampton slaineThe tenth daie of
                    Julie it is not to Lane
BLLan205.Note:
London,  British Library Lansdowne 205 is transcription, 1587; original MS
                    lost.
